channel.title: Amanda Shires on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Amanda Shires on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Amanda Shires Will Break Post-Split Silence With ‘Nobody’s Girl’ Album; First Single, ‘A Way It Goes,’ Focuses on ‘What’s Beautiful About Going Through Hard Things’
item.description: Amanda Shires has been the subject of a lot of “What is she feeling?” talk and speculation over the last year and a half, and she’s mostly laid low during that time, keeping all those emotions to hers
